mstime.Description: Onset (in milliseconds) of the event, measured from the beginning of the experiment (NOT the beginning of any neural data acquisition that might exist)

subject.Description: The string identifier of the subject, e.g. LTP123

trial.Description: Word list (1-24) during which the event occurred. Trial <= 0 indicates practice list.

trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of task action that occurs at the marked time

Levels.STORE_MAPPINGS: Randomized mapping of store names to locations is set.
Levels.REC_WORD: Recalled word, onset of speech (during free recall).
Levels.CUED_REC_CUE: Cue presentation onset during cued recall.
Levels.CUED_REC_WORD: Recalled item during cued recall, onset of speech.
Levels.CUED_REC_STOP: End of cued recall response recording.
Levels.CUED_REC_WORD_VV: Vocalization during cued recall, onset of speech.
Levels.CLASSIFIER_WAIT: Gameplay stops while waiting for a desired classifier result which varies by condition.
Levels.CLASSIFIER: Target classifier result recieved by game, waiting ends. If sham/control list, indicates randomly timed end of waiting period.
Levels.TIMEOUT: Timeout waiting for classifier results - gameplay resumes (item presentation)
Levels.EFR_MARK: Externalized free recall mark - keyboard stroke indicating a recall is an intrusion.
Levels.FFR_START: Beginning of final free recall phase.
Levels.FFR_REC_WORD: Recalled word, onset of speech (during final free recall).
Levels.FFR_STOP: End of final free recall phase.
Levels.BREAK_START: Start mid-session break to rewet scalp cap.
Levels.BREAK_STOP: Stop mid-session break to rewet scalp cap.
Levels.MUSIC_VIDEOS_START: Start of music videos during break.
Levels.MUSIC_VIDEOS_STOP: End of music videos during break.
Levels.MUSIC_VIDEOS_REC_START: Start of recall for music videos.
Levels.MUSIC_VIDEOS_REC_STOP: End of recall for music videos.

store.Description: Store at which the event occurred

storeX.Description: X coordinate on map for store.

storeZ.Description: Z coordinate on map for store.

presX.Description: X coordinate on map for player.

presZ.Description: Z coordinate on map for player.

classifier.Description: Treatment condition for classifier-based timing manipulation.

Levels.Pos: optimizing memory by presenting items on predicted memory success (positive stimulation)
Levels.Neg: impairing memory by presenting items on predicted memory failure (negative stimulation)
Levels.Sham: control condition with random timing of item presentation(sham stimulation)
